医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
怀孕期间的鱼油与儿童体重增加和代谢风险有关《美国临床营养学杂志》上的一项研究发现，怀孕期间补充鱼油与后代十岁时体重增加和代谢综合征的风险增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240225/Fish-oil-in-pregnancy-linked-to-child-weight-gain-and-metabolic-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240225/Fish-oil-in-pregnancy-linked-to-child-weight-gain-and-metabolic-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25773bb5-d312-4f36-9dee-c5991d6a3747 Sun, 25 Feb 2024 19:29:00 -0500 Fish oil in pregnancy linked to child weight gain and metabolic risks
地中海饮食可降低老年女性抑郁风险《英国营养学杂志》上的一项研究发现，坚持地中海饮食与抑郁症状呈负相关，尤其是老年女性，这凸显了这种饮食对心理健康的潜在益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240225/Mediterranean-diet-linked-to-lower-depression-risk-in-older-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240225/Mediterranean-diet-linked-to-lower-depression-risk-in-older-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=672ad892-a91c-4b5f-9d22-4b9dbefa9ed7 Sun, 25 Feb 2024 18:56:00 -0500 Mediterranean diet linked to lower depression risk in older women
新技术可以改变脑部疾病的治疗格局人脑对内部和外部变化的适应性（称为神经可塑性）构成了理解记忆和学习等认知功能以及各种神经系统疾病的基础。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240224/Novel-technique-could-transform-the-treatment-landscape-for-brain-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240224/Novel-technique-could-transform-the-treatment-landscape-for-brain-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=91c454d1-18c0-4c36-beee-94bc730e5551 Sat, 24 Feb 2024 13:21:00 -0500 Novel technique could transform the treatment landscape for brain disorders
研究人员为患有罕见自身免疫性疾病 EGPA 的患者找到了新疗法包括来自麦克马斯特大学和汉密尔顿圣约瑟夫医疗保健中心的研究人员在内的一个国际团队已经为患有一种罕见的自身免疫性疾病（称为嗜酸性肉芽肿性多血管炎（EGPA））的患者找到了一种新的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240224/Researchers-identify-new-therapeutic-for-病人-with-a-rare-autoimmune-disease-EGPA.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240224/Researchers-identify-new-therapeutic-for-病人-with-a-rare-autoimmune-disease-EGPA.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eebfd644-d987-440f-a54d-af08dd5520ba Sat, 24 Feb 2024 13:14:00 -0500 Researchers identify new therapeutic for patients with a rare autoimmune disease EGPA
正念可以缓冲数字工作的阴暗面一项新的研究表明，在数字化工作场所中更加专注的员工能够更好地抵御压力、焦虑和超负荷。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240224/Mindativity-buffers-against-the-dark-side-of-digital-work.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240224/Mindativity-buffers-against-the-dark-side-of-digital-work.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b773dcc2-549b-4684-9b71-17c262d937ae Sat, 24 Feb 2024 13:06:00 -0500 Mindfulness buffers against the dark side of digital work
新生儿 T 细胞被发现在免疫防御方面表现出色长期以来，科学家们一直认为新生儿的免疫系统是成人免疫系统的不成熟版本，但康奈尔大学的最新研究表明，新生儿的 T 细胞（可以预防疾病的白细胞）在抵抗多种感染方面优于成人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240224/Newborn-T-cells-found-to-excel-in-immune-defense.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240224/Newborn-T-cells-found-to-excel-in-immune-defense.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fee41e49-5a9c-4a92-afe6-bf9efa0178ba Sat, 24 Feb 2024 12:59:10 -0500 Newborn T cells found to excel in immune defense
测量大脑活动和皮肤电导来预测一个人的情绪根据新泽西理工学院助理教授豪尔赫·弗雷斯内达的最新研究，机器仍然无法思考，但现在它们可以验证你的感受。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240224/Measurement-of-brain-activity-and-skin-conductance-can-be-used-to-predict-a-persons-emotions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240224/Measurement-of-brain-activity-and-skin-conductance-can-be-used-to-predict-a-persons-emotions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=42f99ba8-bc34-432c-adcc-2f6b2b3b26fb Sat, 24 Feb 2024 12:23:00 -0500 Measuring brain activity and skin conductance to predict a person's emotions
研究人员利用纳米脂质体技术开发有前途的重组流感疫苗重组蛋白疫苗，例如用于对抗 COVID-19 的 Novavax 疫苗，与传统疫苗相比具有多种优势。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240224/Researchers-develop-promising-recombinant-flu-vaccine-using-nanoliposome-technology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240224/Researchers-develop-promising-recombinant-flu-vaccine-using-nanoliposome-technology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eaea4692-308a-42b5-bc36-4ea0b9eb702c Sat, 24 Feb 2024 12:09:15 -0500 Researchers develop promising recombinant flu vaccine using nanoliposome technology
研究揭示了帕金森病进展的关键见解帕金森病是仅次于阿尔茨海默氏病的第二常见的进行性痴呆症，影响着美国近 100 万人，全球估计有 1000 万人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240224/Study-reveals-pivotal-insights-into-the-progression-of-Parkinsons-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240224/Study-reveals-pivotal-insights-into-the-progression-of-Parkinsons-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=142d4ff7-ce75-4a60-a92f-05093e6361c1 Sat, 24 Feb 2024 12:00:36 -0500 Study reveals pivotal insights into the progression of Parkinson's disease
下一代植入物可以通过双能量收集技术提供动力植入式生物医学设备-；如起搏器、胰岛素泵和神经刺激器 -；正在变得更小并利用无线技术，但为下一代植入物提供动力仍然存在障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240224/Next-gen-implants-could-be-powered-by-dual-energy-harvesting-technology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240224/Next-gen-implants-could-be-powered-by-dual-energy-harvesting-technology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cdce9c52-9ed3-4990-b3af-cf205141b2ba Sat, 24 Feb 2024 11:51:05 -0500 Next-gen implants could be powered by dual-energy harvesting technology
